Uses of Class
game.Status_Game

  • Packages that use Status_Game 
    Package Description
    game  

    • Uses of Status_Game in game

      Methods in game that return Status_Game 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Status_Game Game.answer(Status_Game status)
      Asks for defender's answer until it's valid if defender is human Otherwise, it sets the answer as game's generated answer
      Status_Game Game.checkAttempts(Status_Game status)
      checks the number of attempts and changes the status if the maximum is reached
      Status_Game Game.play(Status_Game status)
      Asks for challenger's guess until it's valid
      Status_Game Game.validAnswer(Status_Game status)
      checks the validity of the answer provided compared to the answer built and returns a status accordingly
      Status_Game Game.validExit(Status_Game status)
      ask the user if he wants to play again
      Status_Game Game.validPlay(Status_Game status)
      checks the challenger's guess and changes the status if valid
      Status_Game Game.validPlayAgain(Status_Game status)
      asks the user if he wants to replay
      Status_Game Game.validSetup(Status_Game status)
      Gets the secret Code and changes the status if valid
      static Status_Game Status_Game.valueOf(String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static Status_Game[] Status_Game.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
